abstract: New York State judge presiding over murder trial of former soccer coach Oral Nicholas Hillary, accused of 2011 murder of 12-year-old Garrett Phillips in Potsdam, bars prosecution from using computer program STRmix for analyzing DNA data; decision to deny evidence is another setback for St Lawrence County district attorney Mary E Rain in controversial case.

headline.print_headline: Judge Scraps DNA Test in Trial Over Boy’s Murder Upstate
headline.main: Judge Rejects DNA Test in Trial Over Garrett Phillips’s Murder

snippet: The ruling against the use of a new method of analyzing genetic data dealt a blow to prosecutors trying to convict a former coach of strangling the 12-year-old boy in Potsdam, N.Y....
lead_paragraph: The ruling against the use of a new method of analyzing genetic data dealt a blow to prosecutors trying to convict a former coach of strangling the 12-year-old boy in Potsdam, N.Y.
